      • cancelInProgress

        public void cancelInProgress(String channelName,
                             String transactionID)
                      throws Exception
        Cancels emails that are waiting to be sent.
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        channelName - Name of selected channel.
        transactionID - ID number of transaction
        Throws:
        Exception

      • export

        public ApiTypes.ExportLink export(ApiTypes.LogJobStatusArray statuses,
                                  ApiTypes.ExportFileFormats fileFormat,
                                  Date from,
                                  Date to,
                                  int channelID,
                                  int limit,
                                  int offset,
                                  Boolean includeEmail,
                                  Boolean includeSms,
                                  ApiTypes.MessageCategoryArray messageCategory,
                                  ApiTypes.CompressionFormat compressionFormat,
                                  String fileName,
                                  String email)
                           throws Exception
        Export email log information to the specified file format.
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        statuses - List of comma separated message statuses: 0 for all, 1 for ReadyToSend, 2 for InProgress, 4 for Bounced, 5 for Sent, 6 for Opened, 7 for Clicked, 8 for Unsubscribed, 9 for Abuse Report
        fileFormat - Format of the exported file
        from - Start date.
        to - End date.
        channelID - ID number of selected Channel.
        limit - Maximum of loaded items.
        offset - How many items should be loaded ahead.
        includeEmail - True: Search includes emails. Otherwise, false.
        includeSms - True: Search includes SMS. Otherwise, false.
        messageCategory - ID of message category
        compressionFormat - FileResponse compression format. None or Zip.
        fileName - Name of your file.
        email - Proper email address.
        Returns:
        ApiTypes.ExportLink
        Throws:
        Exception

      • exportLinkTracking

        public ApiTypes.ExportLink exportLinkTracking(int channelID,
                                              Date from,
                                              Date to,
                                              ApiTypes.ExportFileFormats fileFormat,
                                              int limit,
                                              int offset,
                                              ApiTypes.CompressionFormat compressionFormat,
                                              String fileName)
                                       throws Exception
        Export detailed link tracking information to the specified file format.
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        channelID - ID number of selected Channel.
        from - Starting date for search in YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss format.
        to - Ending date for search in YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss format.
        fileFormat - Format of the exported file
        limit - Maximum of loaded items.
        offset - How many items should be loaded ahead.
        compressionFormat - FileResponse compression format. None or Zip.
        fileName - Name of your file.
        Returns:
        ApiTypes.ExportLink
        Throws:
        Exception

      • load

        public ApiTypes.Log load(ApiTypes.LogJobStatusArray statuses,
                         Date from,
                         Date to,
                         String channelName,
                         int limit,
                         int offset,
                         Boolean includeEmail,
                         Boolean includeSms,
                         ApiTypes.MessageCategoryArray messageCategory,
                         String email,
                         Boolean useStatusChangeDate)
                  throws Exception
        Returns logs filtered by specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        statuses - List of comma separated message statuses: 0 for all, 1 for ReadyToSend, 2 for InProgress, 4 for Bounced, 5 for Sent, 6 for Opened, 7 for Clicked, 8 for Unsubscribed, 9 for Abuse Report
        from - Starting date for search in YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss format.
        to - Ending date for search in YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss format.
        channelName - Name of selected channel.
        limit - Maximum of loaded items.
        offset - How many items should be loaded ahead.
        includeEmail - True: Search includes emails. Otherwise, false.
        includeSms - True: Search includes SMS. Otherwise, false.
        messageCategory - ID of message category
        email - Proper email address.
        useStatusChangeDate - True, if 'from' and 'to' parameters should resolve to the Status Change date. To resolve to the creation date - false
        Returns:
        ApiTypes.Log
        Throws:
        Exception

      • loadNotifications

        public ApiTypes.Log loadNotifications(ApiTypes.LogJobStatusArray statuses,
                                      Date from,
                                      Date to,
                                      int limit,
                                      int offset,
                                      ApiTypes.MessageCategoryArray messageCategory,
                                      Boolean useStatusChangeDate,
                                      ApiTypes.NotificationType notificationType)
                               throws Exception
        Returns notification logs filtered by specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        statuses - List of comma separated message statuses: 0 for all, 1 for ReadyToSend, 2 for InProgress, 4 for Bounced, 5 for Sent, 6 for Opened, 7 for Clicked, 8 for Unsubscribed, 9 for Abuse Report
        from - Starting date for search in YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss format.
        to - Ending date for search in YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss format.
        limit - Maximum of loaded items.
        offset - How many items should be loaded ahead.
        messageCategory - ID of message category
        useStatusChangeDate - True, if 'from' and 'to' parameters should resolve to the Status Change date. To resolve to the creation date - false
        notificationType -
        Returns:
        ApiTypes.Log
        Throws:
        Exception

      • summary

        public ApiTypes.LogSummary summary(Date from,
                                   Date to,
                                   String channelName,
                                   ApiTypes.IntervalType interval,
                                   String transactionID)
                            throws Exception
        Loads summary information about activity in chosen date range.
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        from - Starting date for search in YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss format.
        to - Ending date for search in YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss format.
        channelName - Name of selected channel.
        interval - 'Hourly' for detailed information, 'summary' for daily overview
        transactionID - ID number of transaction
        Returns:
        ApiTypes.LogSummary
        Throws:
        Exception
